sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
reinforces a feeling, situation, or process
, deluje na čustva, okoliščine ali dogajanja tako, da postanejo močnejša ali izrazitejša.

seg.quote: This sort of experience reinforces their feelings of worthlessness.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
reinforces an idea or point of view
, ponuja dodatne dokaze ali podporo za neko zamisel ali stališče.

seg.quote: This report reinforces practically everything that has been said.

sense.def:
To reinforce an object
pomeni narediti nekaj, da bo predmet močnejši ali trši.

seg.quote: I had not thought of reinforcing the handles with leather.
